title: 24JDC Court Calendar Hearing Record
description: Output schema for 24th Judicial District Court calendar PDF extraction pipeline v3

hearing_date.description: ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD) or null if not extractable

hearing_time.description: Time string as extracted (e.g., '9:00 AM', '10:30 AM') or null

party_plaintiff.description: Plaintiff name in title case or null if not extractable

party_defendant.description: Defendant name in title case or null if not extractable

case_type.description: Case type in title case (e.g., 'Civil', 'Criminal', 'Domestic') or null

source_url.description: Fixed source URL for this pipeline

raw_text_excerpt.description: First 500 characters of the text block used for extraction

completeness_score.description: Ratio of populated fields to total extractable fields (7)

ocr_confidence.description: Always null â€” no OCR engine confidence is measured
